TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RuleFiringRecord extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the firing record for an event that derives from the class and implements the interface.

span.span: Represents the firing record for an event that derives from the class and implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die Klasse enthält Informationen, die verwendet werden kann, um zu bestimmen, ob das Auslösen des Ereignisses aufgezeichnet werden soll.The class provides information that could be used to determine whether the firing of the event should be recorded. ## Examples Im folgenden Codebeispiel wird veranschaulicht wie die wird verwendet, bei der Übergabe an die Methode.The following code example shows how the is used when passed to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#22)]

summary.span: Gets the last time that the event was last fired.

span.span: Gets the last time that the event was last fired.

value.span: Ein Objekt darstellen, wenn das Ereignis entsprechend letzten seiner ausgelöst.

span.span: A object representing when the event was last fired.

summary.span: Gets the total number of times that the event has been raised.

span.span: Gets the total number of times that the event has been raised.

value.span: Die Gesamtanzahl der Häufigkeit, mit die das Ereignis ausgelöst wurde.
